title: The significance of chirality in contemporary drug discovery-a mini review
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,33429-33448
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05694A, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Narmatha Senkuttuvan, Boopathi Komarasamy, Rajavenkatesh Krishnamoorthy, Shuvajyoti Sarkar, Sivasankaran Dhanasekaran, Parthiban Anaikutti
In this review, we wish to compile examples of chiral medicines approved by the FDA in the years 2022 and 2023 with an emphasis on their synthesis along with information on chiral induction as well enantiomeric excess.
